name: Terror of the time limit
description:
Victor is trapped in an abandoned building where he must escape.

Can you get Victor to save himself?

This story is intended to be larger and more extensive. Of why he became trapped and what he wants from Victor.

Key

Q     Guide

ESC PAUSE

Requirements

Win 64 bit

i5 > processor or equivalent AMD Athlon X4 860K

2,5 GB >= available hard drive

8 GB RAM

DirectX 11 >=

Recommended RTX or RX of graphics card
